short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReviLearn is a powerful Chrome extension that harnesses the potential of spaced repetition to supercharge your learning experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your learning with our innovative Chrome extension! Designed to enhance your knowledge retention using spaced repetition, our tool is a game-changer for acing technical interviews, mastering LeetCode challenges, and boosting overall learning efficiency. Seamlessly add topics or URLs for revision, and effortlessly color code them for easy tracking. Based on your preferences, our extension automatically schedules the URLs for revision on specific dates. Simply right-click and access the options menu to view the topics slated for today's revision. Embrace the power of spaced repetition and conquer new subjects with confidence. Download our extension now and unlock your full learning potential!
